message: What does this mean?  Basic auth is obvious but what is a session key?  Per the docs I should be able to access unauthenticated with just a group_id but I have one specified and that's the message I'm getting.
@mridley is the group a public group? only public groups are accessible without auth

@leah That may be the problem.  I have a private group that I'm using for testing but I figured that it would be the case that anonymous access wouldn't work for a private group so I thought I tried an arbitrary public group but maybe I didn't.  Right now I have my authentication info hardcoded in and when I get the functionality working I'll make my test group public to test with anonymous access and let you know.
Oh you know what - I bet I know what the problem is.  I'm passing the parameters as POST variables because I copied the code from another part of my app.  Let me try again as GET
And now that I'm using GET my cursor is actually working too - how about that :)
@leah OK so I tried making the group public but I get the same error :(
Yeah that was the problem.  Oops.
